div._mce_style: font-family: "Arial Narrow", "Arial MT Condensed Light", sans-serif; color: #000000;

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Good afternoon!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Today was the first day of our Virtual Spirit Week. Thank you to all who participated. The attached photo shares the upcoming days & themes. We hope you will join us in some shared positivity this week!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

strong.span: No New Assignments on Mondays Going Forward

p.span: As we stated before, we donot want this to be a period of undue stress for our families. We are all adjusting to the newnormal and we are all in this together!Beginning Monday, April 20, 2020, and throughout the rest of the distance learning 2019-2020 academic year, we will not assign new work on Mondays. Teachers will continue to be available that day to assist with questions or concerns, but no new work will be assigned for that day.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

div.p: These days will not count as Cycle Days, therefore, the Tuesday that followed would be the next scheduled Cycle Day following Fridays. For example, tomorrow, April 21, is a Cycle Day 2. Please contact your principal with any building or class-specific questions.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: The Central York School District Board of School Directors will hold a virtual public meeting at 6:30PM Monday, April 20, 2020.The meeting agenda will be available via the following link prior to Mondays meeting:

span.style: text-decoration: underline;;color: blue; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Anyone wishing to take part in or attend the Central York School District April 20, 2020 School Board Meeting is required to provide an email address to the District so that the District may email the meeting ID and password.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-stretch: normal;

p.span: Please click the following link

span.style: text-decoration: underline;;color: blue; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: to complete your request to attend the School Board Meeting.You will be emailed a meeting ID and password needed to join the School Board meeting via the email you provided.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-stretch: normal;

p.span: If you wish to share comments to be read during the meeting, they may be emailed to Mr. Brent Kessler, Board Secretary, at

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-stretch: normal;

p.span: If you do not receive your meeting ID and password when the meeting begins, please email Mr. Joseph Lucia, Director of Technology, at jlucia@cysd.k12.pa.us for assistance. (Please note passwords and meeting IDs will be sent after 4:30PM on the day of the meeting).

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: color: rgb(42, 42, 42); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; letter-spacing: 0.2pt;

p.span: Central York High School will join schools throughout the area and around the nation in an effort to show support for our seniors and senior athletes,
whose school year and Spring sports season were abruptly ended due to the Coronavirus pandemic.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: color: rgb(42, 42, 42); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; letter-spacing: 0.2pt;

p.span: For 20 days from April 20 to May 10 Central York High School will light up the stadium at 8:20PM (Military Time: 20:20) for 20 minutes and 20 seconds.
We will display 2020 on the clock as well as on the home/away score and it will be 4th down and 19 to symbolize this pandemic is on its last down and we will get through this together.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

strong.span: We will have a drone fly over to take photos and a photographer present to capture photos of the scoreboard that will be shared for all to use. Thank you to Phil Savard, one of our High School Technology staff members, for volunteering to capture and share this with our families and seniors.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Please be reminded that the stadium will be locked and no one will be admitted inside, as the District continues to follow the government mandated stay-at-home orders.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: text-decoration: underline;;color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

strong.span: Panther Pantry Receives Over $11,000 in Donations

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Thank you to all who have donated to our Panther Pantry during this time. We are proud to share that two of our student-run businesses, the Panther Perk ($2,000) and the Business Department ($5,000), have donated a combined $7,000 to the Panther Pantry. We have also received more than $4,000 in contributions from our families and the community to date. We are continuing to accept monetary donations in lieu of canned goods throughout this closure. Here are three ways to donate:

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-stretch: normal;

p.span: Mail a check payable to CYSD to 775 Marion Road, York, PA, 17406, Attn: Panther Pantry.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-stretch: normal;

p.span: Donate online via the following link:

span.style: text-decoration: underline;;color: rgb(56, 88, 152); font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-stretch: normal;

p.span: Donate your childs Skyward Food Services balance by emailing: Kim Ansell, Assistant Business Manager, at kansell@cysd.k12.pa.us.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: If you are in need of food or household items, Central York School District will hold another Panther Pantry Curbside Pick-Up Night this month. The pantry will be open from 5-6PM April 21 at Central York Middle School, 1950 North Hills Road, York.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: For those needing work permits, Central York High Schools Main Office will be openfrom 11:30 am to 1 pmMondays AND Fridays beginning Monday, April 20, through Monday, May 4. To obtain a work permit, the following is required:

li.span: Original Birth Certificate (cannot be a copy) OR students passport OR students current drivers license or learners permit
Parent/Guardian and student both need to be present (both need to sign)

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: The process takes about 10 minutes. Please be advised that we will havemeasures in place to ensureproper social distancing guidelines are followed. We thank you in advance for your patience and cooperation.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Good afternoon!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: On Monday, April 20, we are launching aVirtual Spirit Weekfor our families, staff and students. Please reference the attachment and join us next week!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Please also note the informationon Light Up the Stadium, which we willstart Monday, April 20 and continue through May 10, 2020.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

em.span: The following are updates to some frequently asked questions as well as information on upcoming activities.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

em.span: Thank you for your continued support of Central York School District

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span:
As we stated before, we donot want this to be a period of undue stress for our families. We are all adjusting to the newnormal and we are all in this together!
Monday, April 20, 2020 will be a day we give our students in Grades K-12 to catch up on anyassignmentsthey havenot yet completed from the previous week.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Teachers will be available asnormal to assist with any questions or concerns, butnonewwork will be assigned and due that day. Monday willnot count as a Cycle Day Tuesday, April 21 will be a Cycle Day 2.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: The Central York School District Board of School Directors will hold a virtual public meeting at 6:30PM Monday, April 20, 2020.The meeting agenda will be available via the following link prior to Mondays meeting:

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: blue;

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Anyone wishing to take part in or attend the Central York School District April 20, 2020 School Board Meeting is required to provide an email address to the District so that the District may email the meeting ID and password.

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: blue;

li.span: to complete your request to attend the School Board Meeting.You will be emailed a meeting ID and password needed to join the School Board meeting via the email you provided.
If you wish to share comments to be read during the meeting, they may be emailed to Mr. Brent Kessler, Board Secretary, at

If you do not receive your meeting ID and password when the meeting begins, please email Mr. Joseph Lucia, Director of Technology, atjlucia@cysd.k12.pa.usfor assistance. (Please note passwords and meeting IDs will be sent after 4:30PM on the day of the meeting).

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Due to the school-mandated closure, the final exams previously scheduled for Central York High School students are cancelled.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.2pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(42, 42, 42);

p.span: Central York High School will join schools throughout the area and around the nation in an effort to show support for our seniors and senior athletes,
whose school year and Spring sports season were abruptly ended due to the Coronavirus pandemic.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.2pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(42, 42, 42);

p.span: For 20 days from April 20 to May 10 Central York High School will light up the stadium at 8:20PM (Military Time: 20:20) for 20 minutes and 20 seconds.
We will display 2020 on the clock as well as on the home/away score and it will be 4th down and 19 to symbolize this pandemic is on its last down and we will get through this together.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Please be reminded that the stadium will be locked and no one will be admitted inside, as the District continues to follow the government mandated stay-at-home orders.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -webkit-standard;

strong.span: News from Our Nurses: Medication Pick-Up Plan

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -webkit-standard;
p.span: A vital role of our school nurses is managing care for children with special health needs. Many care plans require the nurse to administer and store medications or other medical supplies at school. Nurses are working on a pick-up plan for those items that will be safe and as efficient as possible.They will reach out to parents individually when the plan is finalized. In the interim, parents who have an urgent need for their child's medication or healthcare supplies should contact the school principal.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -webkit-standard;
p.span: The health and well-being of the entire CYSD community is our highest priority. Please continue to share questions and concerns with your school nurse as needed. In addition, we are fortunate to have two healthcare systems in York that offer guidance on COVID-19. Please visit their websites listed below for more information:

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -webkit-standard;
p.span: WellSpan Health:www.wellspanhealth.org/coronavirus

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -webkit-standard;
p.span: UPMC:www.UPMCPinnacle.com/COVID19

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Many of you have graciously offered to help stock our Panther Pantry shelves during this time. We are not able to accept food or household items for health and safety reasons, but we are accepting donations to help us continue feeding families in need. You can send checks payable to CYSD to 775 Marion Road York PA 17406 Attn: Panther Pantry, or you can donate online via our secure website here:

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(56, 88, 152);

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: If you wish to donate your childs Skyward Food Services Account balance to the Panther Pantry, please email Ms. Kim Ansell, Assistant Business Manager, atkansell@cyd.k12.pa.us.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: If you are in need of food or household items, Central York School District will hold another Panther Pantry Curbside Pick-Up Night this month. The pantry will be open from 5-6PM April 21 at Central York Middle School, 1950 North Hills Road, York.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

strong.span: Tech Support During Distance Learning Period

p.span: If you need support for a device that is not working, please visithttps://www.cypanthers.org and complete the form requesting assistance OR call the dedicated hotline (717) 814-4180. We will have tech support staff available to assist with issues remotely or to make arrangements to exchange a device, if needed.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: For parents/guardians who need assistance with Skyward/Schoology access, please emailfamilyaccess@cysd.k12.pa.us. Please also reference the attachment, provided by our Technology Support Teachers.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: In case you missed it, we hope you will take time to view the special greetings video created by our CYHS Faculty/Staff for our CYHS students. You can access it here: https://youtu.be/gsIoCDd8l4o

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Stay tuned for additional messages coming from our other schools throughout the next two weeks!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: We are also launching some Virtual Spirit Days to help us stay connected while apart. These will begin on Monday, April 20. If you have an idea for an activity to include in upcoming Spirit Days, please email jromig@cysd.k12.pa.us. Our first weeks activities include the following themes:

strong.span: Central Proud Day, Central Celebrates Seniors Day,

p.span: Central Creates Day,Central Cares Day & Central Connects Day. We will send details on what to capture & how to share on Friday.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

em.span: The following are update to some frequently asked questions as well as information on upcoming activities.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

em.span: Thank you for your continued support of Central York School District

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: The College Board will hold a parent webinar at 7PM April 16 with important information about AP online testing. The webinars will be recorded and archived for later viewing.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Please register here for the April 16 Parent/Guardian webinar about the online AP exams:

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: blue;

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

strong.span: Arena Scheduling Information for CYHS Students

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: In an attempt to be fair and equitable to all students, Central York School District decided earlier this spring to not hold arena scheduling for Central York High Schools 2020-2021 School Year.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: In addition to concerns with access to the Internet for some of our families, many students have questions during the arena scheduling process that may not be addressed in a timely fashion given our current circumstances, which could also create inequities for our students. Students/parents with questions about their childs schedule for next year are encouraged to contact their childs counselor.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span:
As we stated before, we donot want this to be a period of undue stress for our families. We are all adjusting to the newnormal and we are all in this together!
Monday, April 20, 2020 will be a day we give our students in Grades K-12 to catch up on anyassignmentsthey havenot yet completed from the previous week.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Teachers will be available asnormal to assist with any questions or concerns, butnonewwork will be assigned and due that day. Monday willnot count as a Cycle Day Tuesday, April 21 will be a Cycle Day 2.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: The Central York School District Board of School Directors will hold a virtual public meeting at 6:30PM Monday, April 20, 2020.The meeting agenda will be available via the following link prior to Mondays meeting:

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: blue;

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Anyone wishing to take part in or attend the Central York School District April 20, 2020 School Board Meeting is required to provide an email address to the District so that the District may email the meeting ID and password.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Please click the following link

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: blue;

p.span: to complete your request to attend the School Board Meeting.You will be emailed a meeting ID and password needed to join the School Board meeting via the email you provided.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: If you wish to share comments to be read during the meeting, they may be emailed to Mr. Brent Kessler, Board Secretary, at

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: If you do not receive your meeting ID and password when the meeting begins, please email Mr. Joseph Lucia, Director of Technology, at jlucia@cysd.k12.pa.us for assistance. (Please note passwords and meeting IDs will be sent after 4:30PM on the day of the meeting).

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Parents of Central York High School seniors will receive communication in the next few weeks regarding balances on their childs school lunch account and the option to receive a refund, transfer to a sibling or donate. If parents are interested in transferring these balances to the Panther Pantry, please contact

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: The Department of Human Services (DHS) announced the launch of a statewide Support & Referral Helpline staffed by skilled and compassionate staff who will be available 24/7 to assist Pennsylvanians struggling with anxiety and other challenging emotions due to the COVID-19 emergency and refer them to community-based resources that can further help to meet individual needs.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: The toll-free, round-the-clock support line is officially operational. The number to call is1-855-284-2494. For TTY, dial 724-631-5600.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Many other resources also remain available to Pennsylvanians in need of support, including:

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: National Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 1-800-273-TALK (8255)

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Nacional de Prevencin del Suicidio: 1-888-628-9454

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Crisis Text Line: Text PA to 741-741

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Veteran Crisis Line: 1-800-273-TALK (8255)

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Disaster Distress Helpline: 1-800-985-5990

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Get Help Now Hotline (for substance use disorders): 1-800-662-4357

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: National Domestic Violence Helpline 1-800-799-7233

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Safe2Say Something Anonymous Tip Reporting Line for parents and students in Grades 7-12.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Visit the PA Department of Healths dedicated

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(68, 114, 196);

p.span: for the most up-to-date information regarding COVID-19.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Many of you have graciously offered to help stock our Panther Pantry shelves during this time. We are not able to accept food or household items for health and safety reasons, but we are accepting donations to help us continue feeding families in need. You can send checks payable to CYSD to 775 Marion Road York PA 17406 Attn: Panther Pantry, or you can donate online via our secure website here:

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(56, 88, 152);

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: If you wish to donate your childs Skyward Food Services Account balance to the Panther Pantry, please email Ms. Kim Ansell, Assistant Business Manager, at kansell@cyd.k12.pa.us.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: If you are in need of food or household items, Central York School District will hold another Panther Pantry Curbside Pick-Up Night this month. The pantry will be open from 5-6PM April 21 at Central York Middle School, 1950 North Hills Road, York.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: For parents/guardians who need assistance with Skyward/Schoology access, please email familyaccess@cysd.k12.pa.us. Please also reference the attachment, provided by our Technology Support Teachers.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Central York School District is awaiting further guidance from the state government to determine what will occur with our traditionally offered summer camps/athletic camps. As soon as we have more information, we will provide an update to you on the status for this summer.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

strong.span: Tech Support During Distance Learning Period

p.span: If you need support for a device that is not working, please visit https://www.cypanthers.org and complete the form requesting assistance OR call the dedicated hotline (717) 814-4180. We will have tech support staff available to assist with issues remotely or to make arrangements to exchange a device, if needed.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

div.span: The Daily Update is moving to three days a week in an attempt to streamline our communication and avoid inundating you with emails throughout this school closure.
We will share updates on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays going forward.
Thank you for your continued support of Central York School District.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span:
The Central York School District Board of School Directors will hold a virtual public meeting at 6:30PM today, Monday, April 13, 2020.
The meeting agenda is now live and can be viewed on BoardDocs:https://go.boarddocs.com/pa/cyorksd/Board.nsf/goto?open&id=BM5M9A58AE37

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Anyone wishing to take part in or attend the Central York School District April 13, 2020 School Board Meeting is required to provide an email address to the District so that the District may email the meeting ID and password. Please click the following link

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(5, 99, 193);

p.span:
to complete your request to attend the School Board Meeting.You will be emailed a meeting ID and password needed to join the School Board meeting via the email you provided.
Questions/Concerns About Close of School Year/Senior Students
We have received a great deal of correspondence and email from our families following Governor Wolfs announcement that school is closed through the end of the 2019-2020 academic school year. Most of the questions we have received center on the following:

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Graduation

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: PROM

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Senior Activities

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: End-of-School Year Activities (Lunch Balances, Yearbooks, Computers/iPads, Retrieving Items from School)

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Distance Learning Questions

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

em.span: The items listed above are not scheduled for action at tonights School Board meeting but we wanted to address them in this email to you in advance of the meeting.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Please know that we want to honor and recognize our graduating seniors with as much of the traditional activities as possible given the developing situation with the Coronavirus. We have not cancelled or changed PROM or Graduation as of this date. We are also aware that, because of this situation, we need to explore alternative ways to hold these meaningful activities that follow the developing guidance for social distancing. Please be assured that we are working hard to provide alternatives to these traditions for our seniors and families and will provide updated information to you as soon as it is available.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: The administration will continue to provide timely updates to you about these issues as we receive additional guidance from the state and we learn more about that guidelines may be in place closer to these upcoming dates.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

You can send checks payable to CYSD to 775 Marion Road York PA 17406 Attn: Panther Pantry, or you can donate online via our secure website here:

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Good afternoon!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Thank you for your continued support of Central York School District throughout this new chapter of distance learning. We appreciate your continued communication, consideration and care for our students, faculty and staff during this time.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Here are just a few important reminders to keep in mind as we wrap up this week and head into a three-day weekend.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

strong.span: Governor Wolf Extends Mandated School Closures Through End of School Year

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

div.p: Pennsylvania Governor Tom Wolf and Department of Education Secretary Pedro Rivera announced that all Pennsylvania schools will be closed through the remainder of this school year due to the impact of the Coronavirus on our state.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

div.p: Under this extended school closure, we will continue providing distance learning/online instruction as we have been doing since March 30. We will continue in this fashion through the close of the school year.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

div.p: We understand that this new announcement brings with it many more questions and concerns from our families. Please know that we, too, are working through these many different scenarios and what this means for our faculty, staff, families and, most important, our students.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

div.p: We are working on alternate plans for graduation and senior activities as well as Kindergarten Registration. We know that there are many questions and we will communicate with you as we have more guidance and can provide greater detail about all of these things.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

div.p: We are committed to helping guide our community through this and will continue keeping you updated and responding to your questions throughout.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

strong.span: School Board to Hold Virtual Public Meeting Monday, April 13

p.span: Central York School District Board of School Directors will hold a virtual, public School Board meeting Monday, April 13, 2020. The meeting will begin at 6:30PM and include discussion and action items.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: A link to the meeting agenda will be shared in advance. Information on how to access the meeting and participate in it during public comment will be shared prior to the start of the meeting. This information will be available on our District website (
) and emailed to all families via Skyward Family Access Center in advance of the meeting. It will also be shared on our District Facebook Page (
) and Twitter (

to complete your request to attend the School Board Meeting. Thank you.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

strong.span: Panther Pantry Curbside Pick-Up Night April 21 at Central York Middle School

p.span: If you are in need of food or household items, Central York School District will hold another Panther Pantry Curbside Pick-Up Night this month. The pantry will be open from 5-6PM April 21 at Central York Middle School, 1950 North Hills Road, York.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

strong.span: How You Can Help Stock the Panther Pantry During COVID-19

p.span: Although we cannot accept donations of canned goods or household items at this time due to health and safety concerns, we are accepting monetary donations to help our Pantry coordinators shop for needed items. Checks may be made payable to CYSD Panther Pantry and mailed to the Educational Service Center, 775 Marion Road, York, PA, 17406. Thank you in advance for helping support our families in need!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;
p.span: We will continue providing grab-and-go lunch and breakfast meals to students on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. The same number of meals will still be offered, and the meals will still be distributed at Hayshire, Stony Brook, Central York High School and York Learning Center from 12PM-1PM.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

strong.span: Please note we will still serve meals on Friday, April 10, 2020.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

strong.span: An Update from Our School Nurses

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;
p.span: The layers of information about coronavirus (COVID-19) may be causing you to feel uncertain on how to lower risks and stay healthy. One way to protect yourself and your loved ones is to avoid rumors about the virus.
is a web page organized by the World Health Organization (WHO ) to clear up false claims about COVID-19.They also provide
tips to support families during this time of confinement.The National Association of School Nurses (NASN) teamed up with School Psychologists (NASP) to offer guidance on

a.span: Helping Children Cope With Changes Resulting From COVID-19

p.span: as well.If you are worried about keeping shared surfaces in your home clean and safe, the CDC website gives advice on

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;
p.span: We are committed to finding ways to protect and support ALL members of the CYSD community during the coronavirus pandemic. If you wish to contact your school nurse with questions or concerns, please see their contact information listed, below.

p.span: Please note the following items for your information, particularly the changes to our District Calendar for this week and next.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Thank you!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Please note the following important calendar changes for Central York School District related to three days: April 9, April 13 and May, 2020.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: riginally planned as a Teacher In-Service Half-Day. It is now a school day for students and
faculty/

staff. This will be a day of online/distance learning as we have been participating in since March 30. Teachers will be available online during their normal times for assistance (from 9AM-12PM and 1PM-3PM).

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: riginally planned as a Vacation Day. It is now a school day for students and staff. This will be a day of online/distance learning as we have been participating in since March 30. Teachers will be available online during their normal times for assistance (from 9AM-12PM and 1PM-3PM).

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: riginally planned as a Teacher In-Service Day and a Vacation Day for Students. It is now a school day for students and faculty/staff. This will be a day of online/distance learning as we have been participating in since March 30, unless we are otherwise notified by the Governor of Pennsylvania. Teachers will be available online during their normal times for assistance (from 9AM-12PM and 1PM-3PM).

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: **There is no change to Friday, April 10. That is still a Vacation Day for faculty and students. There will be no school activities held on this day, but we will provide grab-and-go meals for students as normally scheduled. (See details, below, for locations and time).

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.br: School Board to Hold Virtual Public Meeting Monday, April 13

p.span: Central York School District Board of School Directors will hold a virtual, public School Board meeting Monday, April 13, 2020. The meeting will begin at 6:30PM and include discussion and action items.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: A link to the meeting agenda will be shared in advance. Information on how to access the meeting and participate in it during public comment will be shared prior to the start of the meeting. This information will be available on our District website (
) and emailed to all families via Skyward Family Access Center in advance of the meeting. It will also be shared on our District Facebook Page (
) and Twitter (

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: medium;

strong.span: Information for Families of Learners Receiving Special Education Services

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: The Central York School District remains committed to addressing the needs of K12 Learners with IEPs through frequent communication with families and teachers / service providers. Last week, aPrior Written Notice / Notice of Recommended Educational Placement was provided to all families along with a cover letteroutlining the reality that, during this mandated school closure, the District may not able to replicate the programming that is currently outlined in their childs most recent Individualized Education Program (IEP) in the home setting. As stated in the document, upon the childs return to school, the District will immediately begin providing all services as outlined in the childs IEP. The District is not proposing changes to learners IEPs but will, to the greatest extent possible, connect the proposed flexible instruction to the services and supports in learners current IEPs.During this temporary mandatory school closure, our staff is dedicated to using best practices and individualizing instruction according to student needs.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Many parents have inquired if they need to return thePrior Written Notice / Notice of Recommended Educational Placement.It is NOT necessary to sign and return a copy at this time. However, we do ask that if you have ANY questions about instruction, coursework and / or materials provided at this time, that you reach out to your childs IEP manager. Please communicate with your childs IEP manager, they are here to help and together we can determine the best modifications and adaptations specific to your learner!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Finally, all upcoming annual IEP meetings and record review re-evaluations that mature during the closure are still being held telephonically or virtually within IDEA timelines and your childs IEP manager should contact you for more information.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Parents/guardians of the members of our CYHS Class of 2020, a group of CYHS parents and a local sign company have partnered to create special yard signs for seniors. If you are interested in ordering one, please contact Jennifer at

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: medium;
p.span: The signs cost $26.50. If you need assistance in paying for a sign for your senior, please share that (confidentially) with the company when you place your order; a group of parents/families will be paying for signs for those in need.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: medium;
p.span: **This is not a district-sponsored activity but is being organized by parents of the Class of 2020.**

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

strong.span: How Your Children Can Read Books from Centrals eBook Collection

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: If your child has finished reading a book or is bored and wants to read another one, Central York School Districts librarians have great news! Students may use their school-issued iPad or personal learning device to download an app and read a book from Centrals eBook collection. Just download the SORA App and check out the video available at this link:
Instructions are also attached for your help. If you have questions, please reach out to your school librarian for assistance.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

strong.span: Tech Support During Distance Learning Period

p.span: If you need support for a device that is not working, please visit https://www.cypanthers.org and complete the form requesting assistance OR call the dedicated hotline (717) 814-4180. We will have tech support staff available to assist with issues remotely or to make arrangements to exchange a device, if needed Please emailfamilyaccess@cysd.k12.pa.usfor assistance with parent/guardian Skyward or Schoology accounts.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: medium;
p.span: We will continue providing grab-and-go lunch and breakfast meals to students on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. The same number of meals will still be offered, and the meals will still be distributed at Hayshire, Stony Brook, Central York High School and York Learning Center from 12PM-1PM. Please note we will still serve meals on Friday, April 10, 2020.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: If you have questions/concerns that have not been addressed in prior communication, please email
so that we may address in the future.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Thank you!

Julie Randall Romig
Director of Communications

strong.a: Letter About Flexible Instruction Days for Families - March 24, 2020
Updated Frequently Asked Questions for Families - March 24, 2020

div.p:
As you are likely aware, the Centers for Disease Control and the Pennsylvania Department of Public Health have issued recent updates on the Coronavirus, a respiratory illness first identified in China in December, 2019.
The following are resources that have been shared with the District and that the District has shared in an effort to help us communicate with our staff, families and community about this issue.
Daily Updates - March 2020
Centers for Disease Control Coronavirus Informational Website
Pennsylvania Department of Health Coronavirus Informational Website
Coronavirus Fact Sheet
Stop the Spread of Germs Fact Sheet (CDC)
Preparing for the Spread of Coronavirus
